name: Slappy Hands
description: Slappy Hands is a two player versus game where your objetive is to SLAP your classmate´s hand! You´re playing in the middle of class, so be sure that the teacher doesn´t find you playing or you will get punished D: So get a friend and start SLAPPING! Thank you so much for playing my game!  #arcade #multiplayer #2player #SlappyHands #FightingGame #School #altgame
